description:
Gone are the days of looking for that “just right’ spot to lean your bike against. This center-mount kickstand makes stepping away from your bike a simple affair.

  • Versatile center-mount design tucks behind the bottom bracket at the narrowest point of the chainstays
  • Grippy foot prevent slipping
  • Durable cast aluminum construction
  • Adjustable length fits a variety of frame sizes
name: Cannondale Eileen 3 Center-Mount Kickstand
